summary: I am an innovative, results-driven leader with a proven track record of achieving exceptional results in a highly competitive workplace. With over ten years of B2B and B2C sales and marketing experience, my abilities consist of but are not limited to: supporting and providing leadership to associates, utilizing a strong analytic and team approach to drive organizational improvements, and implementation of best practices. Results-oriented with a proven record of contributing to the profitability and overall success of companies during my tenure has led to exceeding goals & achieving quarterly objectives. Seeking to leverage my developed skill set, and confident my past experiences will transition into continued success.Colleagues would describe me as an ambitious and creative sales person. By always putting the client first, yet upholding the highest integrity of the business, I am able to grow my client base. I completed my BA in Business Administration with an emphasis in Marketing at Loyola Marymount University.
